product_name: Kurgo Portsmouth Dog Rain Jacket - Medium - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Go on, take a hike with your 4-legged friend even on damp, drizzly days. This medium-size water-resistant jacket keeps your pooch comfortable, while the vintage color combo brightens a cloudy day.
short_description: Go on, take a hike with your 4-legged friend even on damp, drizzly days. This medium-size water-resistant jacket keeps your pooch comfortable, while the vintage color combo brightens a cloudy day.
